title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: After a brief interval of disordered health, she contracted a brain fever, which carried her off abruptly. She died in my house in the Regent's Park on the 25th June 1833 and her remains are placed in the New Cemetery in th* Harrow Road.

title: Life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: After a brief interval of disordered health, she contracted a brain fever, which carried her off abruptly. She died in my house in the Regent's Park on the 25th June 1833, and her remains are placed in the New Cemetery in the Harrow Road.
